data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in As Suwayda‘, Syria.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of As Suwayda‘, Syria
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, help the church in the state of As Suwayda' to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.

data.section_summary: On average, 181 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in As Suwayda‘, Syria.
data.prayer: Jesus, reveal yourself to these new families.
Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of As Suwayda‘, Syria.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 770,000 souls living in the state of As Suwayda' with a taste for your Word. Make it sweet as honey in their mouth.
data.verse: How sweet are your words to my taste, sweeter than honey to my mouth!

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Adyghe people. 0.1% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Spirit, defend the church in the state of As Suwayda' against being inward-focused.
data.verse: The Spirit of the Sovereign LORD is on me, because the LORD has anointed me to proclaim good news to the poor. He has sent me to bind up the brokenhearted, to proclaim freedom for the captives and release from darkness for the prisoners.

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 1,467 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to As Suwayda‘, Syria.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

location.name: As Suwayda'
location.cities_list: As-Suwayda, Shahbā, Şalākhid, Al Qurayyā, Aş Şūrah aş Şaghīrah
